prompts.title: Introduction to Real Estate
prompts.description: Generate an introductory lesson for students new to real estate, covering basic concepts and terminology.

prompts.title: Understanding Property Valuation
prompts.description: Create content explaining the methods of property valuation and factors that influence property prices.

prompts.title: Real Estate Market Analysis
prompts.description: Develop a guide on how to conduct a market analysis for real estate investments.

prompts.title: Legal Aspects of Real Estate
prompts.description: Outline the legal considerations and regulations that students must be aware of in real estate transactions.

prompts.title: Sustainable Real Estate Practices
prompts.description: Generate content on sustainable practices in real estate development and management.
